data.value: Sign in to your Hirebot account

data.name: HirebotDescription
data.value: Your intelligent hiring assistant powered by advanced AI technology.

data.name: SuccessfulSignIn
data.value: You have successfully signed in to your Hirebot account.

data.name: AIScreeningDescription
data.value: Intelligent candidate screening using advanced AI algorithms.

data.name: CandidateManagementDescription
data.value: Comprehensive candidate tracking and management system.

data.name: AnalyticsDescription
data.value: Detailed analytics and insights for better hiring decisions.

data.name: ValidEmailRequired
data.value: Please enter a valid email address

data.name: UsernameHelp
data.value: Username must be 3-20 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and underscores.

data.name: PasswordHelp
data.value: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

data.value: Account created successfully! You can now sign in.

data.value: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.

data.value: Username must be at least 3 characters long.

data.name: UsernameMaxLength
data.value: Username cannot be longer than 20 characters.

data.name: UsernameInvalidChars
data.value: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

data.value: Please enter a valid email address.

data.value: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

data.value: First name must be at least 2 characters long.

data.value: Last name must be at least 2 characters long.

data.value: Failed to create user account. Please try again.

data.name: AboutUsSubtitle
data.value: Revolutionizing recruitment processes with artificial intelligence

data.name: MissionStatement
data.value: Transform the hiring process through advanced AI technology, connecting exceptional talent with perfect opportunities efficiently and fairly.

data.name: CompanyStory1
data.value: Founded in 2022 by a team of experts in technology and human resources, Hirebot-TFI was born from the vision to simplify and improve the hiring process for companies of all sizes.

data.name: CompanyStory2
data.value: Based in Buenos Aires, Argentina, we have rapidly grown to become leaders in AI-powered recruitment solutions in Latin America.

data.name: CEODescription
data.value: 15 years of experience in human resources and technology. Visionary behind Hirebot-TFI.

data.name: CTODescription
data.value: AI and machine learning expert with over 12 years developing innovative solutions.

data.name: CMODescription
data.value: Digital marketing and growth hacking specialist with experience in tech startups.

data.name: InnovationDescription
data.value: We constantly seek new ways to improve and revolutionize the recruitment process.

data.name: TrustDescription
data.value: We build solid relationships based on transparency and reliability.

data.name: ExcellenceDescription
data.value: We commit to always deliver the highest quality in our services.

data.name: CollaborationDescription
data.value: We believe in the power of teamwork and cooperation to achieve common goals.

data.name: ContactUsSubtitle
data.value: We're here to help with all your inquiries

data.name: MessageSentSuccess
data.value: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll contact you soon.

data.name: NearSubway
data.value: Near Callao and Tribunales subway stations

data.name: TermsConditionsSubtitle
data.value: Please read our terms and conditions carefully

data.name: TermsIntroduction
data.value: These terms and conditions govern the use of the Hirebot-TFI website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

data.name: AcceptanceTermsText
data.value: By using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

data.name: ServiceDescriptionText1
data.value: Hirebot-TFI provides an AI-powered recruitment platform that helps companies and candidates connect efficiently.

data.name: ServiceDescriptionText2
data.value: Our services include candidate screening, selection process management, data analytics, and automated communication tools.

data.name: UserResponsibilitiesText
data.value: As a user of our services, you commit to fulfilling certain obligations and responsibilities.

data.name: UserObligation3
data.value: Maintain confidentiality of your access credentials

data.name: UserObligation4
data.value: Not use services for fraudulent or illegal activities

data.name: PrivacyDataProtectionText
data.value: We take your data privacy and protection very seriously. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy.

data.name: IntellectualPropertyText1
data.value: All intellectual property rights related to Hirebot-TFI services belong to our company.

data.name: IntellectualPropertyText2
data.value: You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works from our content without express authorization.

data.name: LimitationLiabilityText1
data.value: Hirebot-TFI shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages that may arise from the use of our services.

data.name: LimitationLiabilityText2
data.value: Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services in the twelve months prior to the claim.

data.name: ServiceTerminationText1
data.value: You may terminate your account at any time by following the process indicated on the platform.

data.name: ServiceTerminationText2
data.value: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms and conditions.

data.name: TermsModificationText
data.value: We may update these terms occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes and your continued use constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

data.name: ApplicableLawText
data.value: These terms are governed by the laws of the Argentine Republic. Any dispute shall be resolved in the competent courts of Buenos Aires.

data.name: ContactInformationText
data.value: If you have questions about these terms and conditions, you can contact us at:

data.name: PrivacyPolicySubtitle
data.value: Your privacy is important to us

data.name: PrivacyCommitmentText
data.value: At Hirebot-TFI, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information with the highest security standards.

data.name: InformationCollectionText
data.value: We collect information you provide to us directly and automatically when you use our services.

data.name: InformationUseText
data.value: We use your information to provide, improve, and personalize our services.

data.name: Purpose4
data.value: Analytics and development of new features

data.name: InformationSharingText1
data.value: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes without your consent.

data.name: InformationSharingText2
data.value: We may share information in specific and limited circumstances:

data.name: SharingCircumstance2
data.value: Required by law or competent authorities

data.name: SharingCircumstance3
data.value: With service providers who help us operate

data.name: SharingCircumstance4
data.value: To protect rights, safety, or property

data.name: DataSecurityText1
data.value: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information.

data.name: SecurityMeasure1
data.value: Data encryption in transit and at rest

data.name: UserRightsText
data.value: You have several rights regarding your personal information that we respect and facilitate.

data.name: CookiesTrackingText1
data.value: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience and analyze usage of our services.

data.name: CookiesTrackingText2
data.value: You can control cookies through your browser settings, although this may affect some functionalities.

data.name: DataRetentionText1
data.value: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy.

data.name: DataRetentionText2
data.value: When no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize your information.

data.name: ChildrenPrivacyText
data.value: Our services are not directed at minors under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.

data.name: PolicyChangesText
data.value: We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes via email or notices on our platform.

data.name: PrivacyContactText
data.value: For privacy inquiries or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

data.name: SecurityPolicySubtitle
data.value: Protecting your information with the highest standards

data.name: SecurityCommitmentText
data.value: Security is fundamental in everything we do. We implement robust measures to protect your information and our systems.

data.name: DataProtectionText
data.value: We use multiple layers of security to protect your sensitive information at all times.

data.name: EncryptionDescription
data.value: All data is encrypted using AES-256 algorithms both in transit and at rest.

data.name: SecureServersDescription
data.value: Our servers are hosted in certified data centers with 24/7 physical security.

data.name: AccessControlDescription
data.value: We implement multi-factor authentication and least privilege principles.

data.name: MonitoringDescription
data.value: Continuous 24/7 monitoring of all our systems and networks.

data.name: UserSecurityText
data.value: Your security is a shared responsibility. We provide tools and recommendations to keep your account secure.

data.name: IncidentResponseText1
data.value: We have a comprehensive security incident response plan that allows us to act quickly against any threat.

data.name: IncidentResponseText2
data.value: Our security team is available 24/7 to respond to security emergencies.

data.name: IncidentStep3
data.value: Forensic investigation and root cause analysis

data.name: IncidentStep4
data.value: Notification to affected users if applicable

data.name: ComplianceCertificationsText
data.value: We maintain the most important industry certifications to ensure the highest security standards.

data.name: RegularAuditsText
data.value: We conduct regular security audits both internally and by independent third parties.

data.name: ReportingSecurityText
data.value: If you discover a security vulnerability, we encourage you to report it responsibly through our secure channels.

data.name: SecurityContactText
data.value: To report security issues or emergencies, contact us immediately:

data.name: PolicyUpdatesText
data.value: This policy is regularly reviewed and updated to reflect security best practices and changes in applicable legislation.

data.value: Product stock must be greater than or equal to 0.

data.value: No products are available in this category or the catalog is empty.

data.name: FooterDescription
data.value: AI-powered human resources management system to optimize recruitment processes.

data.name: DisplayedCatalogHint
data.value: This catalog will be visible to all users on the public page

data.value: Create your first chatbot to start managing automated conversations.

data.value: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.

data.value: Administrative control panel to manage the Hirebot-TFI system

data.name: CatalogManagementDescription
data.value: Manage products, categories and catalog content

data.name: LogManagementDescription
data.value: Review system logs and user activity

data.value: No data available to display at this time.

data.name: NoCommentsMessage
data.value: Be the first to comment on this product.

data.name: CommentError
data.value: Error processing comment. Please try again.

data.name: LoginToCommentMessage
data.value: You must sign in to add comments and ratings.

data.name: ConfirmDeleteComment
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

data.name: CommentTooShort
data.value: Comment must be at least 10 characters long.

data.name: CommentPendingApproval
data.value: Comment added successfully. It will be visible after moderation.

data.name: PasswordRecoveryMessage
data.value: We received a request to reset your password. If you didn't request this change, you can safely ignore this email.

data.name: PasswordRecoveryInstructions
data.value: To reset your password, click the button below. This link is valid for 24 hours for security reasons.

data.name: PasswordRecoveryExpiration
data.value: This link will expire in 24 hours for your security.

data.name: PasswordRecoveryDisclaimer
data.value: If you didn't request a password reset, you can ignore this email. Your password won't be changed.

data.name: PasswordChangeConfirmationMessage
data.value: Your password has been changed successfully. If you made this change, you don't need to do anything else.

data.name: PasswordChangeConfirmationSecurity
data.value: If you didn't make this change, please contact our support team immediately to secure your account.

data.name: PasswordChangeConfirmationContact
data.value: If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to contact us anytime.

data.name: WelcomeEmailMessage
data.value: We're excited to welcome you to {0}! Your account has been successfully created and you can now start exploring all our features.

data.name: WelcomeEmailFeatures
data.value: With your new account you can:

data.name: WelcomeEmailFeature3
data.value: Access exclusive features for registered users

data.name: WelcomeEmailSupport
data.value: If you have any questions or need help, our support team is here to assist you.

data.name: EnterEmailForRecovery
data.value: Enter your email address or username to recover your password

data.name: PasswordResetSuccess
data.value: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.

data.name: RecoveryEmailSent
data.value: If the email address or username exists in our system, you will receive a message with instructions to reset your password.

data.name: TokenExpired
data.value: The recovery link has expired. Please request a new link.

data.name: TokenInvalid
data.value: The recovery link is not valid. Please request a new link.

data.name: TokenAlreadyUsed
data.value: This recovery link has already been used. Please request a new link if you need to reset your password again.

data.name: PasswordResetError
data.value: An error occurred while resetting the password. Please try again.

data.name: RecoveryRequestError
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.

data.name: PasswordRecoveryEmailSent
data.value: If an account exists with that email or username, you will receive a password reset link

data.name: PasswordRecoveryError
data.value: An error occurred during password recovery. Please try again

data.name: InvalidRecoveryToken
data.value: The recovery link is invalid or has expired

data.name: RecoveryTokenExpired
data.value: The recovery link has expired. Please request a new one

data.name: RecoveryTokenUsed
data.value: This recovery link has already been used. Please request a new one if you need to reset your password again

data.value: Email address or username is required

data.name: ManageAllOrganizations
data.value: Manage all organizations in the system from this panel. You can create, edit, and supervise organizations and their members.

data.name: CreateFirstOrganization
data.value: Create your first organization to get started

data.name: SlugHelpText
data.value: Only letters, numbers, and hyphens. Will be used in the organization URL.

data.name: JoinOrganizationDescription
data.value: Join this organization to access its resources and collaborate with other members

data.name: ManageMembersDescription
data.value: Manage organization members and their roles

data.name: ChatbotManagementDescription
data.value: Manage all system chatbots, including creation, editing, deletion and organizational assignment.

data.name: ChatbotInstructionsHelp
data.value: Instructions that define the chatbot's behavior and personality.

data.name: OrganizationAssignmentHelp
data.value: Select the organization this chatbot will belong to.

data.value: Don't worry, we'll help you recover it

data.name: RecoveryInstructionsShort
data.value: Enter your email address and we'll send you a secure link to reset your password.

data.name: EnterEmailOrUsernameHelp
data.value: Enter your email address or username to recover access to your account

data.name: TokenExpiresSoon
data.value: This link expires soon for your security

data.name: TokenExpiredHelp
data.value: If your link has expired or doesn't work, you can request a new one

data.value: You can send another recovery email if needed.
